attributes.action: No aerosol treatments allowed in dental practices to reduce risk of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To prevent dental professionals of risking their health as the profession is one of the riskiest for patients and for member of staff and because we are currently suffering , stressing and hoping we won’t get the virus and we can come back to our families safe and healthy .
attributes.background: I want government to completely prohibit using aerosol in dental practices which includes regular non urgent dental appointments like fillings , tooth canal treatments , scaling, etc. As a dental professionals we are in  high risk of coronavirus and we need to be safe in such a dangerous profession

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has updated their guidance to say all non-urgent dental treatment should stop.

If you would like the Government to take further measures than this, including banning emergency treatments if they involve aerosol, you could start a petition asking for that to happen.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
